options.text: Talk to Moira About Joel and the Wraith

nodes.text: There's a Wraith in the Catacombs that has Joel Kyro trapped...

nodes.message: This should not happen - covered in greeting messages.

nodes.text: A Wraith! We have to save him.

options.text: Talk to Moira About Joel and the Wraith

nodes.text: Joel could be dying! Why aren't we rescuing him now?
I can probably defeat a Wraith in combat. However, judging from what you have said, this is a Master Wraith. It's not enough to just defeat it. The magical barrier will remain.
To destroy the Wraith, I will need to find and destroy its soul container. That means I'll need to defeat it in combat, find the phylactery, and destroy that while the Wraith is contained.
However, I hope that Silvia... Professor Featherspoonhaugh... can come up with something to disrupt the Wraith long enough for you to rescue Joel while I'm fighting the Wraith.
I asked Gregor about the cloth shipment for you. he said that it would be in soon and he would deliver it to you personally.
Thank you, Shawn, I knew that Gregor could be counted upon, but I was afraid that the shipment might arrive too late for the First Aid Class. It's good to know that it will be here on schedule.
It was kind of you to go out of your way for this favor.

options.text: Volunteer to Do Something Else for Her

nodes.text: If there's anything else you need, I'll be happy to do it for you.
If you are in for another favor, I'll be needing some ingredients for making up some healing salve. I could use five fresh red roses from the courtyard.
You'll need to be quite picky about it. Only the brightest and nicest will do for the salve, so don't just grab any rose willy-nilly.
I'd really appreciate that if you could get them to me soon.
I'll be happy to get some roses for you, Lady Moira.
Thank you, Shawn, That will be very kind of you.

nodes.name: Roses for Moira
nodes.description: I need to bring her back five perfect red roses. That shouldn't be too hard, should it?

nodes.text: Maybe later. I'm busy right now.
You're quite welcome. It was no problem. I see Gregor regularly.
Gregor is a very sweet person. He's always so helpful.
I brought you the roses you asked me to get for you.
Why, thank you, Shawn! They are perfect. Seems a shame to pull them all to pieces to make the salve, but they will help heal a wound some day.
Here - take this Magical Bandage to use if you ever are injured.
Thank you for the bandages. Let me know if I can do anything else for you.
Well, then, as long as you are offering... I need to send some more bandages down to Chef Kinah to use in the kitchen. Would you be a dearling and take them to her?
Of course!
Here then, please take these five bandages to her. Her students sometimes get a little carried away with their carving skills.

nodes.name: Bandages for Ifetaya
nodes.description: I offered to take some bandages to the kitchen for Moira. No biggie.

options.text: Tell About Giving Bandages to Ifetaya

nodes.text: I delivered your bandages to Ifetaya as you asked.
'tis sweet and kind of you to do these errands for me.
Here, take this Healing Potion. May it ease your pain in time of need.
Is there anything else I can do for you?
Surely, Shawn, you have better things to do with your time than to be my messenger. You've done more than enough for me with all your kindness.
Thank you for everything.
